snippet: A deadly plane crash in Siberia early on Monday was the latest in a string of accidents that have eroded confidence in Russia’s commitment to air safety.
abstract: At least 31 people die in a plane crash in Siberia, the latest in a string of deadly crashes that have eroded confidence in Russia's commitment to air safety.

byline.contributor: Nicola Clark contributed reporting from Paris.

lead_paragraph: A deadly plane crash in Siberia early on Monday was the latest in a string of accidents that have eroded confidence in Russia’s commitment to air safety.

headline.seo: Russian UTair Plane Crashes in Siberia; 31 Dead
headline.print_headline: A Plane Crash in Siberia Kills 31 Just After Takeoff
